mods.abstract: RUN AWAY. FROM the undersigned, at New Iberia, on the 28th December last, a negre man named JOHN, aged about 38 or 40, stuttering when speaking. This boy is supposed to be lurking in the whereabouts of Washington. He was purchased by Mr. Blainière, at the sale of the Estate of Jacques Dupré, in 1847. A liberal reward will be given to any one bringing his back said boy to the undersigned, or for his lodging in jail. ULGER DECUIR. New Iberia, St-Martin, Feb 14, 1857--1m

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
